event.description: Captain, it looks like some sauronids snuck into the ship on our last stop, and are now nesting in one of the coolant pods. What should we do?

option.result: The crew detaches the coolant pod. It glides into the cold eternity of space.

option.description: Vent some fuel into the coolant bay.
option.result: The fuel is toxic to the sauronids. They all die a hideous death.

option.description: Organize a crew to hunt them down.
option.result: The hunting party is a great success. Only one crew member is lost.
